posts.post_content:
This is from a scrapbook rescue project.  I soaked the cards in distilled water ONLY to remove them from the pages and dried them between non-bleached paper towels.  As you can see in the scans, there are glue stains and paper loss on the back of this Cobb.

Sold net to me, delivered, with PayPal preferred.  

I have other T205s available as well, please let me know if you are interested.

Please email me at [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] to purchase or with any questions.  Thanks!
